A client asked us to make a holiday film starring 20 puppies and we said yes. Apparently, other people are just as excited as we are.

node.title: Intel x Thorn: Using AI for Good

body.body:
Intel and Thorn recently partnered to Childfinder; a facial recognition technology to help end child sex trafficking. We helped them make a mission video to announce the partnership and it made it into some news avenues. Take a look/read.

- [Linked In](https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/using-ai-help-end-child-sexual-exploitation-matthew-rosenquist/?trackingId=JpSWoAAHzwk%2Fi%2FEKGajBjg%3D%3D)
- [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/video/intel-using-ai-try-missing-203822411.html)

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Intel and Thorn recently partnered to Childfinder; a facial recognition technology to help end child sex trafficking. We helped them make a mission video to announce the partnership and it made it into some news avenues. Take a look/read.

  • Linked In
  • Yahoo Finance
